definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
frame (e.g. door frame)/casing/fig. framework/template/to circle (i.e. draw a circle around sth)/to frame/to restrict/Taiwan pr. [kuang1]

sentences.english: At the top is a Text Box where the user enters a name to search in the phone book as a String.
sentences.chinese: 在顶部是一个用户能输入名称来搜索电话薄的文本框。

sentences.english: The extender automatically writes the selected date to the companion TextBox.
sentences.chinese: 该扩展程序会自动将选定日期写入对应的文本框。

sentences.english: You can add or change the information in any text box on this page.
sentences.chinese: 可以在该页面的任何文本框中添加或修改信息。

sentences.english: Notice that the page re-renders while the Text box still populates.
sentences.chinese: 注意页面被重新呈现，而文本框依然填充着。

sentences.english: This design provides a freeform text box.
sentences.chinese: 这个设计提供了一个自由的文本框。

sentences.english: Improved styles for text boxes and 'callouts'. Fully anti-aliased, with drop shadows and gradient fills.
sentences.chinese: 改进了文本框和插图编号的风格。

sentences.english: Nobody likes text all scrunched up in a little box like that.
sentences.chinese: 没人愿意将所有的文本放在这个小型文本框内阅读。

sentences.english: The first text box starts to count down the seconds.
sentences.chinese: 第一个文本框将开始倒计时读秒。

sentences.english: This same folder is used to save notes taken in the text pop-up box.
sentences.chinese: 这个文件夹还用于保存弹出式文本框中的注释。

sentences.english: Inserts a subrange of an array of characters into the contents of the TextBox.
sentences.chinese: 插入一个字符数组的子串到文本框的内容中。

sentences.english: Show up the On Screen keyboard if the user sets the focus on a textfield.
sentences.chinese: 显示屏幕上的键盘，如果用户设置一个文本框的焦点。

sentences.english: Increased text-box widths and number of decimals for radius entries.
sentences.chinese: 增加文本框的宽度和半径的条目数为小数。

sentences.english: GtkEntry - a single line text entry field.

definition: a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
